high_descs: Head forward to the bed in front of you
Pick up the blue book that is sitting on the bed; the book that says Probabilistic Robotics
Turn to your right and walk to the night stand
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the night stand
anns.task_desc: Read a book by lamp light

high_descs: walk forward a few steps, turn right, take two steps, turn left, walk to bed
pick up the book that is on the bed
turn around, take a step, turn left to face small table
anns.task_desc: examine a book with a lamp

high_descs: Walk forward to face the bed.
Pick the book up from the bed.
Turn to the right and face the night stand with the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a bed and turn a lamp on.
